ExploreFact.Text: This is where I completed my training.
This planet was once lush, but now it has been consumed by an ice age.
A makeshift space program was developed to escape the ice age to a more habitable planet.

RumorFact.Text: Sunfish says there might be more information on the start of an ice age in the South Village.

ExploreFact.Text: The ice age was preceded by a sudden earthquake throughout the entire planet, then heat started being seemingly erased from existence, violating the laws of physics.
Over two years Icy Ridges went from an icy planet to having liquid water and a thick opaque atmosphere.

RumorFact.Text: There is a Precursor ruin on this planet.

ExploreFact.Text: The Precursors built something they refer to as the "second node", which provides stability for some device.
The Precursors mentioned being far from their home system.
